sentences.literal: Tu Wei Dun Zang Tian Han first year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘一，小餘三百五十九；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder one, small remainder three hundred fifty nine;
Large remainder twenty six, small remainder eight;
Zhu Li Xie Qiao second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘二十五，小餘二百六十六；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder twenty five, small remainder two hundred sixty six;
Large remainder thirty one, small remainder sixteen;
Shang Heng Dun Tan third year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘十九，小餘六百一十四；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder nineteen, small remainder six hundred fourteen;

sentences.chinese: 大餘三十六，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder thirty six, small remainder twenty four;
Zhao Yang Zuo E fourth year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘十四，小餘二十二；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder fourteen, small remainder twenty two;
Large remainder forty two, no small remainder;
Heng Ai Yan Mao Tai Shi first year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘三十七，小餘八百六十九；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder thirty seven, small remainder eight hundred sixty nine;
Large remainder forty seven, small remainder eight;
